rules: Rule1: Either organic is certified by certification body, or if grain is transported by truck, then it is processed in milling facility.
Rule2: Whenever product is ready for market at distribution center, it is labeled by label printer.
Rule3: Either product is ready for market at distribution center, or it is packaged by packaging machine.
Rule4: If product is packaged by packaging machine, then either quality check passes inspection team or farm operation is profitable during financial year.

Rule5: If farm manager supervises farm operation, then when it is not the case that if farm owner operates farm business then whenever product is labeled by label printer, either quality check passes inspection team or farm operation is profitable during financial year, it follows that regulation does not violate agricultural board.

Rule6: If quality controller monitors production line, then when it is not the case that if farm owner operates farm business then whenever product is labeled by label printer, either quality check passes inspection team or farm operation is profitable during financial year, regulation does not violate agricultural board.
Rule7: In case farm owner hires farm manager, then farm manager supervises farm operation.
Rule8: Either farm owner hires farm manager, or farm owner contracts quality controller.
Rule9: Assuming farm owner contracts quality controller, then quality controller monitors production line.
Rule10: Whenever crop matures during growth period, farm operation is profitable during financial year.
Rule11: If crop flowers during blooming stage, then crop matures during growth period.
Rule12: Under the condition that crop fruits during ripening phase, crop flowers during blooming stage.
Rule13: Either market rejects product, or quality check does not fail inspection team.
Rule14: Either proper temperature is maintained by cooling system, or humidity level is controlled by dehumidifier.
Rule15: In case humidity level is controlled by dehumidifier, then product does not spoil due to storage conditions.

Rule16: If wheat field is planted with seed variety, then when it is not the case that if farm operation is not profitable during financial year then fertilizer requires compost, yield target achieves production goal.
Rule17: Provided that quality manager ensures storage standards, if proper temperature is maintained by cooling system, then product does not spoil due to storage conditions.
Rule18: Either irrigation system uses water pump, or if grain is transported by truck, then it is processed in milling facility.
Rule19: Under the condition that farm owner authorizes system upgrade, if new system is installed by installation crew, then irrigation system functions at optimal level.
Rule20: If wheat field is irrigated using water system, then wheat field is planted with seed variety.
Rule21: Either wheat field is irrigated using water system, or wheat field is fertilized with fertilizer.
Rule22: Provided that wheat field is fertilized with fertilizer, then wheat field is planted with seed variety.
Rule23: In case crop is harvested by combine harvester, then product spoils due to storage conditions.
Rule24: Assuming crop is harvested by combine harvester, then grain is stored in silo.
Rule25: If grain is stored in silo, then grain is transported by truck.

Rule26: If it is not the case that if farm owner operates farm business then whenever product is labeled by label printer, either quality check passes inspection team or farm operation is profitable during financial year, then regulation violates agricultural board.
Rule27: In case it is not the case that if crop grows in farm field then crop fruits during ripening phase, then quality check fails inspection team.
Rule28: If it is not the case that if irrigation system uses water pump then water system delivers water flow, then irrigation pipe leaks, causing water loss.
Rule29: Provided that it is not the case that if irrigation system uses water pump then water system delivers water flow, then technician repairs irrigation system.
Rule30: Assuming it is not the case that if technician repairs irrigation system then irrigation pipe does not leak, causing water loss, then new system is installed by installation crew.
Rule31: Provided that farm operation is not profitable during financial year, then crop is harvested by combine harvester.
Rule32: Whenever farm operation is not profitable during financial year, then fertilizer does not require compost.
facts: Fact1: Farm owner operates farm business.
Fact2: Crop grows in farm field.
Fact3: Quality manager ensures storage standards.
Fact4: Farm owner authorizes system upgrade.
Fact5: Organic is not certified by certification body.
Fact6: Quality check does not pass inspection team.
Fact7: Yield target does not achieve production goal.
Fact8: Market does not reject product.
Fact9: Water system does not deliver water flow.
Fact10: Irrigation system does not function at optimal level.
Fact11: Grain is not processed in milling facility.

question: Farm operation is profitable during financial year.
